title: Wireless MIDI on the EP-133 KO-II?? (NO Computer Needed)
description:
0:00 Intro
0:15 CME WIDI UHost
0:41 Setup: Connections & Power
1:02 Turn on Keys Mode
1:16 Mono & Polyphonic Modes
1:30 Auditioning Samples Quickly
1:55 MIDI Keyboards
2:10 OMNI MIDI Channel
2:37 Velocity
2:47 CC Controls?

Gear used:
@CMEPro WIDI Uhost
@teenageengineering EP-133 KO-II Sampler
@KorgOfficial Nanokey Studio

Here's how you connect:
USB-C power to Uhost 'USB Power'
USB-C-to-C cable from Uhost 'USB Host/Device' port to 'USB' on KO-II
Connect to Uhost with a Bluetooth enabled MIDI controller by turning it on near the powered Uhost.
That's it!
